title: Save the Grymforge Gnomes
content:
Save the Grymforge Gnomes Type Quest Chapter Act I Location Grymforge Reward Gold

Save the Grymforge Gnomes

Save the Grymforge Gnomes is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Save the Grymforge Gnomes can be acquired during Act I. Completing Save the Grymforge Gnomes will progress the story forward.

Save the Grymforge Gnomes Objectives

Free the Deep Gnomes

We spoke to some gnome captives. Their leader Beldron is trapped in the cave-in, and their friend Philomeen ran off with some explosives. We found
